dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.trigger
Class SidebarTrigger

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.trigger.AbstractTrigger
      dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.trigger.AbstractConfigurableTrigger
          dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.trigger.SidebarTrigger
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<AbstractTrigger>
public class SidebarTrigger
extends AbstractConfigurableTrigger

Sidebar triggers are used to register wizards for the sidebar view.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2008.b

Constructor Detail

SidebarTrigger

public SidebarTrigger(java.lang.String id,
                      java.lang.String wizardId,
                      java.lang.String wizardType,
                      java.lang.String label,
                      org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image icon,
                      java.lang.String description,
                      java.lang.String categoryId)
Constructor for wizards with an explicit wizard type.

Parameters:
id - The id of the trigger
wizardId - The id of the wizard
wizardType - AbstractTrigger.WIZARD_TYPE_DIALOG|AbstractTrigger.WIZARD_TYPE_EDITOR
label - The label is the path unter which the trigger is shown in the sidebar. Path elements are split by a '/'
icon - The optional icon shown in the GUI of the trigger (e.g. on a button)
description - The optional tooltip
categoryId - The categoryId is used to group wizards in the sidebar view
Since:
2008.b

SidebarTrigger

public SidebarTrigger(java.lang.String id,

Constructor for wizards with an explicit wizard type.

Parameters:
id - The id of the trigger
type - The type of the trigger
wizardId - The id of the wizard
wizardType - AbstractTrigger.WIZARD_TYPE_DIALOG|AbstractTrigger.WIZARD_TYPE_EDITOR
label - The label is the path unter which the trigger is shown in the sidebar. Path elements are split by a '/'
icon - The optional icon shown in the GUI of the trigger (e.g. on a button)
description - The optional tooltip
categoryId - The categoryId is used to group wizards in the sidebar view
Since:

SidebarTrigger

public SidebarTrigger(java.lang.String id,
                      java.lang.String type,
                      java.lang.String wizardId,
                      java.lang.String wizardType,
                      java.lang.String label,
                      org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image icon,
                      java.lang.String description,
                      java.lang.String categoryId,
                      java.lang.String finalPerspectiveID,
                      java.lang.String[] preferredPerspectiveIDs)
Constructor for wizards with an explicit wizard type.

Parameters:
id - The id of the trigger
type - The type of the trigger
wizardId - The id of the wizard
wizardType - AbstractTrigger.WIZARD_TYPE_DIALOG|AbstractTrigger.WIZARD_TYPE_EDITOR
label - The label is the path unter which the trigger is shown in the sidebar. Path elements are split by a '/'
icon - The optional icon shown in the GUI of the trigger (e.g. on a button)
description - The optional tooltip
categoryId - The categoryId is used to group wizards in the sidebar view
finalPerspectiveID - The optional ID of a workbench perspective to switch to when a sidebar trigger of type AbstractTrigger.WIZARD_TYPE_EDITOR is opened.
preferredPerspectiveIDs - The optional IDs of other perspectives that are also considered just fine (besides the finalPerspective). If the current perspective is among them, the perspective is not switched. Only applies if finalPerspective is given.
Since:
12.0

SidebarTrigger

public SidebarTrigger(java.lang.String id,
                      java.lang.String type,
                      java.lang.String wizardId,
                      java.lang.String wizardType,
                      boolean undoRedo,
                      java.lang.String label,
                      org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image icon,
                      java.lang.String description,
                      java.lang.String categoryId,
                      java.lang.String finalPerspectiveID,
                      java.lang.String[] preferredPerspectiveIDs)
Constructor for wizards with an explicit wizard type.

Parameters:
id - The id of the trigger
type - The type of the trigger
wizardId - The id of the wizard
wizardType - AbstractTrigger.WIZARD_TYPE_DIALOG|AbstractTrigger.WIZARD_TYPE_EDITOR
undoRedo - If the trigger shall provide Undo/Redo functionality (only relevant for Dialogs!)
label - The label is the path unter which the trigger is shown in the sidebar. Path elements are split by a '/'
icon - The optional icon shown in the GUI of the trigger (e.g. on a button)
description - The optional tooltip
categoryId - The categoryId is used to group wizards in the sidebar view
finalPerspectiveID - The optional ID of a workbench perspective to switch to when a sidebar trigger of type AbstractTrigger.WIZARD_TYPE_EDITOR is opened.
preferredPerspectiveIDs - The optional IDs of other perspectives that are also considered just fine (besides the finalPerspective). If the current perspective is among them, the perspective is not switched. Only applies if finalPerspective is given.
Since:
12.0
Method Detail

getCategoryId

public java.lang.String getCategoryId()
Retrieve the category id

Returns:
The category id
Since:
2008.b

getFinalPerspectiveID

public java.lang.String getFinalPerspectiveID()
Returns:
The optional ID of a workbench perspective to switch to when a sidebar trigger of type AbstractTrigger.WIZARD_TYPE_EDITOR is opened. Maybe null.
Since:
12.0

getPreferredPerspectiveIDs

public java.lang.String[] getPreferredPerspectiveIDs()
Returns:
The optional IDs of other perspectives that are also considered just fine (besides the getFinalPerspectiveID()), maybe null. If the current perspective is among them, the perspective is not switched.
Since:
12.0
